Texts.Chs:
曾经受到过外星势力的侵入，使他们专注于研究自己的军事和防御。他们是非常训练有素的战士，它们的水生起源使它们在水中特别危险，因此成为一种不可忽视的力量。

  ^orange;食性^reset;: 杂食

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  能量上限 x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;5^reset; 防御, +^green;500^reset; 呼吸时间
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^cyan;30^reset;% 寒气抗性, +^cyan;10^reset;% 辐射抗性
  ^cyan;游泳加速 2^reset;

^orange;环境^reset;:
  海洋生态: 生命上限 x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;6^reset; 防御
  炎热生态: 能量上限 x^red;0.7^reset;, HP x^red;0.7^reset;, 速度 x^red;0.8^reset;
  (生命/污染/沼泽) 水 : +^green;0.5^reset;% 生命回复速度, 生命值上限 x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;6^reset; 防御.


^orange;武器^reset;:
  能量武器专精: +^green;15^reset;% 
  突击步枪专精: +^green;25^reset;%

^red;弱点^reset;:
  ^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% 电系抗性
Texts.Eng:
Once invaded by an alien force which forced them to focus on their military and their defenses, they're extraordinary well trained fighters. Their aquatic origins make them especially dangerous in water and make them a force to be reckoned with.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;5^reset; Defense, +^green;500^reset; Breath
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;20^reset;% Ice, +^cyan;10^reset;% Radioactive
  ^cyan;Swim Boost 2^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Ocean biomes: Health x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;6^reset; Defense
  Hot biomes: Energy x^red;0.7^reset;, Health x^red;0.7^reset;, Speed x^red;0.8^reset;
  (Healing/Waste/Swamp) Water: +^green;0.1^reset;% Health Regen

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Energy Weapon Mastery: +^green;15^reset;%
  Assault Rifle Mastery: +^green;25^reset;%

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Electric
